name: Cornelsen Trainer: Mathe Klasse 6
synopsis: With “Cornelsen Trainer” students have access to Nintendo DS titles for the first time that are completely curriculum-based and specifically focused on core school subjects – this is a first on the console market. In addition, there is the greatest need for tutoring nationwide in the subjects of English and mathematics, and Cornelsen, as a provider of content, stands for quality and seriousness.
